categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi actors

nodes.text: Togo Igawa is a Japanese actor who portrayed Idrosen Gawat in Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi. He has also appeared in major movie pictures such as the crime thriller Revolver, the drama film Memoirs of a Geisha, the epic war film The Last Samurai, and the action comedy Johnny English Reborn.
